attributes.action: demand that all future Public and Sporting events within the UK, wishing to honour the British/Commonwealth War dead must do so with a minutes silence. No deviation from this traditional practice is acceptable, such as a minutes applause or cheering. Any failure to guarantee a minutes silence prior to/at the Public or Sporting event must result in the cancellation/postponement of the event. This we demand in memory of those who made the ultimate sacrifice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Only a minutes silence can ensure that our Great Fallen rest in peace.
